source: TEXT_HEAVNZ223_01792_SEQ_00<tab>The Vath storyteller is concerned about the risk of Dravanian attack.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ223_01792_SEQ_00<tab>ヴァスの塚のストーリーテラーは、困っているようだ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ223_01792_SEQ_01<tab>The Vath storyteller asks you to gather silver dew. The plant grows on a raised area to the west of Tailfeather. Head there, collect three bunches of silver dew, and deliver them to the Vath storyteller.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ223_01792_SEQ_01<tab>ストーリーテラーから、<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8AD001 /var>を集めてくるように頼まれた。高地ドラヴァニアのスモーキングウェイストで、「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61E9A7301 /var>」を3つ入手しよう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ223_01792_SEQ_02<tab>You have found and gathered the silver dew. Return to Loth ast Vath and deliver it to the storyteller.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ223_01792_SEQ_02<tab><var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8AD001 /var>を入手した。ヴァスの塚の「ストーリーテラー」に「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8AD001 /var>」を渡そう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ223_01792_SEQ_03<tab>The storyteller explains to you how the Vath have avoided Dravanian attacks for so long: burning silver dew produces a strong-smelling smoke. Dragons cannot stand the smell of this smoke and avoid the area of Loth ast Vath altogether.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ223_01792_SEQ_03<tab>ストーリーテラーに<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8AD001 /var>を渡した。ヴァスの塚がドラゴン族に襲われないのは、<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8AD001 /var>を焚いた煙の香りをドラゴン族が嫌っているためらしい。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ223_01792_TODO_00<tab>Gather three bunches of silver dew.
TEXT_HEAVNZ223_01792_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the silver dew to the Vath storyteller.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ223_01792_TODO_01<tab>ストーリーテラーに<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8AD001 /var>を渡す

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ223_01792_STORYTELLER_000_000<tab>Greetings, generous hunter. I would make another request of you. <click> <click> Please gather three bunches of silver dew and bring them back to us.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ223_01792_STORYTELLER_000_000シシシシシ……よく来たな狩人よ、頼みがあるのだ。
「」という香り立つ香草を、3束ほど集めてくれぬか？

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ223_01792_STORYTELLER_000_001<tab>Silver dew can be found near Tailfeather. There stands a raised area, west of Tailfeather, where the plant grows. Gather the plants there, then bring them back to us here.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ223_01792_STORYTELLER_000_001……「」なら、
「テイルフェザー」の西の高台にあろう。
頼むぞ、狩人よ……シシシシシ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ223_01792_STORYTELLER_000_010<tab>Have you found the silver dew? It grows to the west of Tailfeather.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ223_01792_STORYTELLER_000_010……「」なら、
「テイルフェザー」の西の高台にあろう。
頼むぞ、狩人よ……シシシシシ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ223_01792_STORYTELLER_100_020<tab><click> <click> Do you have the silver dew?
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ223_01792_STORYTELLER_100_020<tab>シシシシシ……<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8AD001 /var>は手に入ったか？

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ223_01792_STORYTELLER_000_020<tab>Thank you, hunter. We can now feel safe.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ223_01792_STORYTELLER_000_020<tab>……これで一安心だ、感謝する……シシシシシ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ223_01792_STORYTELLER_000_031<tab>The smell of burning silver dew─the smoke it produces─is unbearable to dragons. It will keep them away, making Loth ast Vath safe─for a time.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ223_01792_STORYTELLER_000_031シシシシシ……を焚くと、
ドラゴン族が嫌う香りを持つ、独特の煙が立ち上る。
これを定期的に焚くことで、我らは竜を避け生活しておるのだ。
